name: ChemicalPneumonitisDisordersICD10CM
title: Chemical Pneumonitis (Disorders) (ICD10CM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has Chemical Pneumonitis regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: This value set contains concepts related to a diagnosis of Chemical Pneumonitis),(Inclusion Criteria: Chemical Pneumonitis),(Exclusion Criteria: Radiation Pneumonitis, Drug-induced Pneumonitis, Other types of Interstitial Pneumonitis)

concept.display: Bronchitis and pneumonitis due to chemicals, gases, fumes and vapors
Pneumonitis due to inhalation of oils and essences

contains.display: Bronchitis and pneumonitis due to chemicals, gases, fumes and vapors
Pneumonitis due to inhalation of oils and essences
